name: Virtual Harlem - Library Pod
description:
This is a temporary page to showcase Virtual Harlem's progress in Fall 2021 from senior IUPUI students. All 3 pods are contained within three separate links due to itch.io's upload limit, but this is a good way to show our progress individually while waiting for website access.

-     Fall 2021 Team   |   Ariel Sturgis, Alina Sheikh, Claire McAllister
